sentence.idiomatic: Hello. I want a library card.
OK. Did you bring your passport?
Yes. A library card requires a passport as well as filling out an application form. You can download one from the web, or get one here.
Can you get a card on the same day?
Yes. Which card do you want?

There is a card that enables you to only check out books to read while in the library, and one that lets you check out books to take home. Then that is divided into cards based on how long and how many books you can borrow. Which one would you like?
I want the one with the most features. What is the fee?
50 RMB a year, and a 1000 RMB cash deposit.
Because to be able to check out books costs more. Don't worry, you can get your money back in the end.
Oh. How many books can I check out at once? How long can I keep them?
The most you can borrow is five books, and you can keep them for a month. Some books you can renew, which can be done online. It is very convenient.
What happens when your book is overdue?

There is a fine when you exceed the return date. So you must remember to return them in a timely fashion. In addition, if you lose a book, you must pay five times the original price as compensation. Damaged books also require a fee.
OK, I got it. Thank you.
No problem. Next time bring your passport to get your card.
